speaker: TALBOT
text:
O
               
              young
               
              John
               
              Talbot
              ,
               
              I
               
              did
               
              send
               
              for
               
              thee

speaker: TALBOT
text:
To
               
              tutor
               
              thee
               
              in
               
              stratagems
               
              of
               
              war
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
That
               
              Talbot’s
               
              name
               
              might
               
              be
               
              in
               
              thee
               
              revived

speaker: TALBOT
text:
When
               
              sapless
               
              age
               
              and
               
              weak
               
              unable
               
              limbs

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Should
               
              bring
               
              thy
               
              father
               
              to
               
              his
               
              drooping
               
              chair
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
But
              —
              O
              ,
               
              malignant
               
              and
               
              ill-boding
               
              stars
              !
              —

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Now
               
              thou
               
              art
               
              come
               
              unto
               
              a
               
              feast
               
              of
               
              Death
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
A
               
              terrible
               
              and
               
              unavoided
               
              danger
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Therefore
              ,
               
              dear
               
              boy
              ,
               
              mount
               
              on
               
              my
               
              swiftest
               
              horse
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              I’ll
               
              direct
               
              thee
               
              how
               
              thou
               
              shalt
               
              escape

speaker: TALBOT
text:
By
               
              sudden
               
              flight
              .
               
              Come
              ,
               
              dally
               
              not
              ,
               
              be
               
              gone
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Is
               
              my
               
              name
               
              Talbot
              ?
               
              And
               
              am
               
              I
               
              your
               
              son
              ?

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
And
               
              shall
               
              I
               
              fly
              ?
               
              O
              ,
               
              if
               
              you
               
              love
               
              my
               
              mother
              ,

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Dishonor
               
              not
               
              her
               
              honorable
               
              name

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
To
               
              make
               
              a
               
              bastard
               
              and
               
              a
               
              slave
               
              of
               
              me
              !

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
The
               
              world
               
              will
               
              say
               
              “
              He
               
              is
               
              not
               
              Talbot’s
               
              blood
              ,

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
That
               
              basely
               
              fled
               
              when
               
              noble
               
              Talbot
               
              stood
              .
              ”

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Fly
              ,
               
              to
               
              revenge
               
              my
               
              death
               
              if
               
              I
               
              be
               
              slain
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
He
               
              that
               
              flies
               
              so
               
              will
               
              ne’er
               
              return
               
              again
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
If
               
              we
               
              both
               
              stay
              ,
               
              we
               
              both
               
              are
               
              sure
               
              to
               
              die
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Then
               
              let
               
              me
               
              stay
               
              and
              ,
               
              father
              ,
               
              do
               
              you
               
              fly
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Your
               
              loss
               
              is
               
              great
              ;
               
              so
               
              your
               
              regard
               
              should
               
              be
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
My
               
              worth
               
              unknown
              ,
               
              no
               
              loss
               
              is
               
              known
               
              in
               
              me
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Upon
               
              my
               
              death
              ,
               
              the
               
              French
               
              can
               
              little
               
              boast
              ;

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
In
               
              yours
               
              they
               
              will
              ;
               
              in
               
              you
               
              all
               
              hopes
               
              are
               
              lost
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Flight
               
              cannot
               
              stain
               
              the
               
              honor
               
              you
               
              have
               
              won
              ,

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
But
               
              mine
               
              it
               
              will
              ,
               
              that
               
              no
               
              exploit
               
              have
               
              done
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
You
               
              fled
               
              for
               
              vantage
              ,
               
              everyone
               
              will
               
              swear
              ;

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
But
               
              if
               
              I
               
              bow
              ,
               
              they’ll
               
              say
               
              it
               
              was
               
              for
               
              fear
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
There
               
              is
               
              no
               
              hope
               
              that
               
              ever
               
              I
               
              will
               
              stay

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
If
               
              the
               
              first
               
              hour
               
              I
               
              shrink
               
              and
               
              run
               
              away
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Here
               
              on
               
              my
               
              knee
               
              I
               
              beg
               
              mortality
              ,

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Rather
               
              than
               
              life
               
              preserved
               
              with
               
              infamy
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Shall
               
              all
               
              thy
               
              mother’s
               
              hopes
               
              lie
               
              in
               
              one
               
              tomb
              ?

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              rather
               
              than
               
              I’ll
               
              shame
               
              my
               
              mother’s
               
              womb
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Upon
               
              my
               
              blessing
               
              I
               
              command
               
              thee
               
              go
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
To
               
              fight
               
              I
               
              will
              ,
               
              but
               
              not
               
              to
               
              fly
               
              the
               
              foe
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Part
               
              of
               
              thy
               
              father
               
              may
               
              be
               
              saved
               
              in
               
              thee
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
No
               
              part
               
              of
               
              him
               
              but
               
              will
               
              be
               
              shame
               
              in
               
              me
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Thou
               
              never
               
              hadst
               
              renown
              ,
               
              nor
               
              canst
               
              not
               
              lose
               
              it
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Yes
              ,
               
              your
               
              renownèd
               
              name
              ;
               
              shall
               
              flight
               
              abuse
               
              it
              ?

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Thy
               
              father’s
               
              charge
               
              shall
               
              clear
               
              thee
               
              from
               
              that
               
              stain
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
You
               
              cannot
               
              witness
               
              for
               
              me
              ,
               
              being
               
              slain
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
If
               
              death
               
              be
               
              so
               
              apparent
              ,
               
              then
               
              both
               
              fly
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              leave
               
              my
               
              followers
               
              here
               
              to
               
              fight
               
              and
               
              die
              ?

speaker: TALBOT
text:
My
               
              age
               
              was
               
              never
               
              tainted
               
              with
               
              such
               
              shame
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
And
               
              shall
               
              my
               
              youth
               
              be
               
              guilty
               
              of
               
              such
               
              blame
              ?

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
No
               
              more
               
              can
               
              I
               
              be
               
              severed
               
              from
               
              your
               
              side

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Than
               
              can
               
              yourself
               
              yourself
               
              in
               
              twain
               
              divide
              .

speaker:
JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
Stay
              ,
               
              go
              ,
               
              do
               
              what
               
              you
               
              will
              ;
               
              the
               
              like
               
              do
               
              I
              ,

JOHN
               
              TALBOT
text:
For
               
              live
               
              I
               
              will
               
              not
              ,
               
              if
               
              my
               
              father
               
              die
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Then
               
              here
               
              I
               
              take
               
              my
               
              leave
               
              of
               
              thee
              ,
               
              fair
               
              son
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Born
               
              to
               
              eclipse
               
              thy
               
              life
               
              this
               
              afternoon
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Come
              ,
               
              side
               
              by
               
              side
              ,
               
              together
               
              live
               
              and
               
              die
              ,

speaker: TALBOT

And
               
              soul
               
              with

              from

              to

              .
